synopsis.text: Features a new narrative and cast, unconnected to the previous Monster Strike movie and web series, the story unfolds in a world where a section of Tokyo was sundered and elevated to the heavens thirteen years ago. This celestial metropolis, now known as 'Old Tokyo,' has been isolated from its terrestrial counterpart, 'New Tokyo,' with all communication and interaction severed between the two. A young girl, sensing the imminent descent of Old Tokyo, embarks on a treacherous expedition to New Tokyo, driven by the urgent need to safeguard its inhabitants from the looming catastrophe. Amidst this crisis, enigmatic creatures emerge, leading to the fortuitous encounter of a blue-haired girl named Sora and a young man named Kanata. Alongside vampire siblings Toya and Yuna, and monsters Ryoma, Kamu, and Hanzo, they unite to determine the world's destiny.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
